headline.main: IMPORTANT FROM ALBANY.; Confirmation of the New Health Officer and Marine Hospital Physician--Three Newport Wardens Nominated--City Hall Bill Passed--License Bill Lost--No Harbormasters to be Nominated--$200,000 voted to the Albany and Susquehanna Railroad--The Personal Liberty Bill Reconsidered and Recommitted for Amendments--Filibustering, &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate in Secret Session did a good job today--I mean that it sealed up a host of open questions, and relieved the anxiety of several anxious people. The Governor's nominees for Health Officer, Dr. Gunn, of New-York, and for Physician of the Marine Hospital, Dr. Jerome, of Trumanville, were confirmed.

docs.snippet: THE SLAUGHTER OF THE INNOCENTS.--The Grand Jury recently discharged in the Court of Over and Terminer, mad a presentment which was found on file yesterday. They visited the County buildings in Flatbush, and found them in a commendable conditions as...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE SLAUGHTER OF THE INNOCENTS.--The Grand Jury recently discharged in the Court of Over and Terminer, mad a presentment which was found on file yesterday. They visited the County buildings in Flatbush, and found them in a commendable conditions as to cleaniness and the health of the females except the nursery.

headline.main: ENGLISH POLITICS.; The Prospects of the Reform Bill-Its Effect upon Party Arrangements--The Government--general of India--The Italian Question--Amusements, Mr. Dickens, & c.

docs.lead_paragraph: As the day approaches when the strength of parties is to be tried in Parliament, on the question of Reform, curiosity increases as to the course which various minor sections, as well as particular individuals will take. In spite of all the outward show of unanimity on the part of the Whigs, there still prevails much of the old dissension and distrust.

docs.snippet: In Oregon, lately, one Mr. Elijah Dodson, of Yardhal County, petitioned the Legislature for a divorce from his wife, but after the bill granting it had passed one House, he addressed a memorial to the other, begging a stay of proceedings after the...
docs.lead_paragraph: In Oregon, lately, one Mr. Elijah Dodson, of Yardhal County, petitioned the Legislature for a divorce from his wife, but after the bill granting it had passed one House, he addressed a memorial to the other, begging a stay of proceedings after the following fashion: "After my best respects, I wish to inform you that my old woman has returned and I have found her all right,

docs.snippet: Mayor TIEMANN has put the responsibility of the shameful continuance in office of Mr. City Inspector MORTON upon the proper persons, by his letter which we to-day publish, returning his nomination of ELIJAH F. PURDY to the Board of Aldermen for their...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor TIEMANN has put the responsibility of the shameful continuance in office of Mr. City Inspector MORTON upon the proper persons, by his letter which we to-day publish, returning his nomination of ELIJAH F. PURDY to the Board of Aldermen for their action.

docs.snippet: An important report was presented, signed by the Lieutenant-Governor and all the Commissioners of the Canal Fund, setting forth the fact that the surplus fund for the payment of the interest on the Canal debt is entirely exhausted, and that to pay...
docs.lead_paragraph: An important report was presented, signed by the Lieutenant-Governor and all the Commissioners of the Canal Fund, setting forth the fact that the surplus fund for the payment of the interest on the Canal debt is entirely exhausted, and that to pay the interest and the deficiency of the debt $1,039,000 will be needed. This amount, they intimate, must be provided for by the Legislature,
